confirmEmail.success: Thank you for confirming your email.
confirmEmail.title: Confirmation of your email

emailNotConfirmed.message: Your email has not been confirmed. Check your emails to find the verification email. You can also click on the following button to receive it again.
emailNotConfirmed.seeEmail: See your email to find the verification messages
emailNotConfirmed.title: Unconfirmed email

no_access.notWithinDateRange: Your user account is currently inactive

externalLogin.accountCreated: Your account was created. Please check your emails to find the confirmation message for your email address.
externalLogin.emailNotAvailable: No email available with this login information. Impossible to continue.
externalLogin.instructions2: Click the "Register" button to create your account and continue the login process.
externalLogin.title: Register using an external account

forgotPassword.instructions: Enter the email associated with your account. An email message will be sent to you allowing you to choose a new password.
forgotPassword.seeEmail: See your email to find the reset messages
forgotPassword.title: Reset your password

identity.ExternalLoginExists: A user with that external login already exists.
identity.InvalidUserName: User name {0} is invalid, can only contain letters or digits.
identity.LockoutNotEnabled: Lockout is not enabled for this user.
identity.PasswordRequireNonLetterOrDigit: Passwords must have at least one non letter or digit character.
identity.PasswordRequiresDigit: Passwords must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').
identity.PasswordRequiresLower: Passwords must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').
identity.PasswordRequiresNonAlphanumeric: Passwords must have at least one non letter or digit character.
identity.PasswordRequiresUpper: Passwords must have at least one lowercase letter ("A" - "Z").
identity.PasswordTooShort: Passwords must be at least {0} characters.
identity.UserAlreadyHasPassword: User already has a password set.

login.cantRemember: This login will not be remembered until you provide an authenticator app code at log in or disable 2FA and log in again.
login.title: Log in to your account

loginWithSMS.instructions: A text message will be sent to you containing a verification code. This function is only available if you have a verified phone number configured.
loginWithSMS.seeSMS: Verify your text message for the code
loginWithSMS.title: SMS Log in

mfa.appNotAvailable: Don't have access to your authenticator device?
mfa.appNotAvailableRecoveryCodes: Log in with a recovery code.
mfa.instructions: Your login is protected with an authenticator app. Enter your authenticator code below.
mfa.title: Two-factor authentication

passwordExpired.instructions: Your password has expired or needs to be changed. Choose a new password.
passwordExpired.title: Password expired

passwordRequirement.RequireNonAlphanumeric: Requires a special character that is not a letter or a number (Ex. $% * # Etc.)
passwordRequirement.title: Password requirements

passwordless.instructions: You have requested to log in without a password. A log in link will be sent to you by email.
passwordless.seeEmail: Check your emails to find the passwordless connection link
passwordless.title: Passwordless login

recoveryCode.instructions: You have requested to log in with a recovery code.
recoveryCode.title: Recovery code verification

register.accountCreated: Your account was created. Please check your emails to find the confirmation message for your email address.
register.instructions: Enter your email and choose a password.
register.passwordMustMatch: Password and confirmation must be the same
register.title: Register

resetPassword.success: Your password has been successfully changed.
resetPassword.title: Reset password
